Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0938 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0938 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.9.19-10, affected by CVE-2025-0938
